qcfpunch:AsceticMonk.NAME: Ascetic Monk
qcfpunch:AsceticMonk.DESCRIPTION: Start with Broken Tusk, Necklace Of Skulls and Lotus Statue. Sometimes, you have to remove the excess.

qcfpunch:BlazingFist.NAME: Blazing Fist
qcfpunch:BlazingFist.DESCRIPTION: Start with Black Training Shirt, Red Gi and Unceasing Flame. Who needs Block?

qcfpunch:BlueJade.NAME: Blue Jade
qcfpunch:BlueJade.DESCRIPTION: Start with Spiky Bracers, White Boots and Handcuffs. If uncertain... you have time kid.

qcfpunch:DeltaSpike.NAME: Delta Spike
qcfpunch:DeltaSpike.DESCRIPTION: Start with Red Beret, Green Leotard and Special Ops Insignia. Draw, draw, prepare, action!

qcfpunch:FreshStart.NAME: Fresh Start
qcfpunch:FreshStart.DESCRIPTION: Start without any Starter relics. Who needs Ironclad's Boiling Blood, am I right? :)

qcfpunch:HalfHealthBar.NAME: Half Health Bar
qcfpunch:HalfHealthBar.DESCRIPTION: Start with 50% Max HP. Also 200% courage and 200% OUCH.

qcfpunch:IndestructibleFortress.NAME: Indestructible Fortress
qcfpunch:IndestructibleFortress.DESCRIPTION: Start with Army Boots, Chain With Nametags and Combat Fatigues. Because the best defense... is the best defense, duh.

qcfpunch:QuarterHealthBar.NAME: Quarter Health Bar
qcfpunch:QuarterHealthBar.DESCRIPTION: Start with 25% Max HP. Send me a message if you managed to beat Act 3 or the Heart with this much initial HP. .-.

qcfpunch:RedCyclone.NAME: Red Cyclone
qcfpunch:RedCyclone.DESCRIPTION: Start with Wrestler's Cloak, Wild Herbs Ointment and Red Cyclone Teachings. Getting stronger with pain and then stunning all opposition.

qcfpunch:UnboundedCreativity.NAME: Unbounded Creativity
qcfpunch:UnboundedCreativity.DESCRIPTION: Start with Rainbow Brush. Random multicolor shenanigans!

qcfpunch:WanderingWarrior.NAME: Wandering Warrior
qcfpunch:WanderingWarrior.DESCRIPTION: Start with Duffel Bag, Fighting Gloves and Red Headband. You don't excel, but have the tools to surpass any challenge.
